channel.title: [Help] Open multiple VMs in one VM and use Whonix
channel.description:
Hello,
I want to open a second VM in my virtual machine (Oracle VirtualBox).
Then, in the second VM, I want to open a third VM. In the third VM I want to import the Whonix ova file and use Whonix.
Can you tell me please, what hardware requirements I need?
Should I buy Intel9 or Ryzen9? Do I need more than 32 GB of RAM? What specifications are important? What do I need?
Current problem: I tried to start Whonix in my current virtual machine. Importing the .ova file works. When starting Gateway it "*freezes*".
Please help me. The Prices for the hardware doesn't matter. The main thing is that I can open 3 or 4 virtual machines "inside each other" (Nested Virtualization) and use Whonix.
The strange thing is: If I open a second virtual machine with windows OS in a virtual machine, "inside each other" that works without problems. But Whonix freezes.
Thanks in advance.
Kind regards

item.title: [Help] Open multiple VMs in one VM and use Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
StevenT:

I want to open a second VM in my virtual machine (Oracle VirtualBox).

Kicksecure – 1 Sep 22

Nested Virtualization

It is possible to run Virtual Machines (VMs) inside other VMs. That is called Nested Virtualization.

(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

StevenT:

Can you tell me please, what hardware requirements I need?

Nothing special because it’s Whonix.
Unspecific to Whonix.

Whonix – 25 Jul 22

Information Booster might be Available!

Utilizing other resources to help solve questions/issues unspecific to Whonix ™.

StevenT:

Current problem:
I tried to start Whonix in my current virtual machine.
Importing the .ova file works. When starting Gateway it “freezes”.

On top of following above instructions for nested virtualization, you’d need to also fulfill the usual Whonix system requirements which are documented here:

Whonix – 24 Nov 22

System Requirements

Whonix ™ System Requirements

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Open multiple VMs in one VM and use Whonix

Hello,

I want to open a second VM in my virtual machine (Oracle VirtualBox).

Importing the .ova file works. When starting Gateway it “freezes”.

The strange thing is:
If I open a second virtual machine with windows OS in a virtual machine, “inside each other” that works without problems. But Whonix freezes.
